name: Creating the Monster
description:
A different take on the Virtual Pet genre, akin to spinning plates. Make sure the meters don't empty. Dependent on the Food, Drink, etc. you feed the Heart, different monsters will appear.

There is a "True Ending" to find. Will you find the true monster?

Note: I will upload the new Web version after Ludum Dare's judging is over. Other downloads will be available as and when I release them.
